org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class AbstractAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractPluginOptions
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxAnnotation, LineAnnotation

    public abstract class AbstractAnnotation
extends AbstractPluginOptions
    Base class to define an annotation into AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin.
    It contains all commons properties to define an annotation (BoxAnnotation or LineAnnotation.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
